comment:
This module contains helpers that deal with different byte orders
## (`endian`:idx:).

name: swapEndian64
description: copies <cite>inp</cite> to <cite>outp</cite> swapping bytes. Both buffers are supposed to contain at least 8 bytes.

name: swapEndian32
description: copies <cite>inp</cite> to <cite>outp</cite> swapping bytes. Both buffers are supposed to contain at least 4 bytes.
